channel.title: 508 error?
channel.description: ON my 508i try to play on davids source as my test source it works then i try to change my player/character rights t 2 and it just resets my character or deleted why?

item.title: 508 error?
item.dc:creator: @oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo
item.description:
@oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo wrote:

happend to me too what i did to fix it, you need to save your char on the server, so
log-in, go to a shop buy like 2 things wear them

logout-then open the file with WORDPAD *(very important) don’t use notepad.
after that change your rights, then don’t click save, just click SAVE-AS then ok and ok.
hopfully it should work.

Read full topic
